knimeNode.name: Spark (Un)persist
knimeNode.shortDescription: (Un)persists the incoming RDD using the specified storage level.

fullDescription.intro:
This node (un)persists (caches) the incoming RDD using the specified persistence level. The different storage levels are described in detail in the Spark documentation.
Caching RDD might speed up operations that need to access the same RDD several times e.g. when reading an RDD within a loop body in a KNIME workflow.
fullDescription.option: Specify the absolute number of rows in the sample. If there are less rows than specified here, all rows are used.
